name: Dead/Line
description: Dead/Line is a sci-fi interactive fiction made with Ink based on an original post-apocalyptic world. You will be playing Yuri, a communication engineer who lives in a research station in the South Pole, called Mac-Town. He wants to reconnect with the world, because after the third world war everyone on the South Pole has been disconnected.  Your only weapon is time, use it very well!
